msg: - Enabled 2 test cases (11 tests) in Archive component

author: jpic
msg: - Enabled 2 test cases (22 tests) in Graph component

author: kwall
msg: The tests rely on a sync() to make sure the Broker has received the sent messages and has had a chance to invoke flow-control. However,
a defect in tests testClientLogMessages and testSendTimeout meant that an inactive session was actually being sync'd, rather than
the one used to produce the messages.  This will probably explain the sporadic failure.

author: olamy
msg: [SCM-664] Git short revision number (emulate command git rev-parse --short=LENGTH)
